game.name: World War Pilot
game.description:
World War has just begun and you as a brave and courageous pilot have taken the responsibility of saving your country. The entire sky is full of enemy planes and the only way to win this battle is to fly your plane and destroy all your enemies. Hey boys! You have to discover the new weapons and collect upgrades while guiding your plane through multiple levels in this brand-new adventure game. Join World War Pilot and be prepared to drive a weapon-packed plane like never before!

You have no choice of taking your steps back so take your seat on your plane and clear the sky from all the dangerous enemies in this super realistic flight simulator game. Use your flying abilities to grace the skies and prove the world that you are a champion in operating an aeroplane! Take it forth and back if needed to avoid the attacks of your enemy planes! Control your plane at an appropriate speed to win the fight in the sky in this cool HTML5 flying game!

This casual air fight challenge will surely help polish your flying skills and keep you glued to the screen of your desktop and mobile phone for hours. Keep completing multiple missions to clear all the stages and upgrade your planes further! There are different challenging missions to accomplish, seamless gameplay and improved graphics and mechanics to explore. Try out more popular titles from the category of free flying games that are playable on multiple devices without download!

game.webControlKeys: ARROWS TO MOVE THE PLANE, SPACE- SHOOT
